pageTitle: Citizen thanks mayor, judge/executive for efforts | CKNJ.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {24741=The Central KY News Journal | circulation@cknj.com | 270-465-8111 P.O. Box 1138, 200 Albion Way, Campbellsville, KY 42718 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 31963=Copyright © 2015, 19070=A heartfelt thank you is offered to Campbellsville Mayor Tony Young and Taylor County Judge/Executive Eddie Rogers for coming out on July 4 in a persistent rain and presenting the proclamation that identifies Campbellsville as a "Purple Heart City." It was an honor to have them present at the Edwards-O'Banion Post 82 American Legion Hall for the ceremony originally scheduled for the main stage Fourth of July activities.}
